item.title: Sturdy Industries Falls 17.24% Amidst 52-Week Low and Market Pressure
item.description: Sturdy Industries endured a challenging week, with its stock price declining sharply by 17.24% from Rs.0.29 to Rs.0.24, significantly underperforming the Sensex, which rose 1.35% over the same period. The week was marked by a fresh 52-week low, a sharp gap down at the open, and sustained bearish momentum amid weak fundamentals and subdued trading activity. Time: 28 minutes ago

item.title: Rajesh Exports Drops 15.01%: 6 Key Factors Behind the Sharp Weekly Decline
item.description: Rajesh Exports Ltd. endured a challenging week from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026, with its stock price plunging 15.01% from ₹212.20 to ₹180.35. This sharp decline contrasted starkly with the Sensex’s 1.35% gain over the same period, underscoring company-specific pressures amid a broadly resilient market. The week was marked by consecutive lower circuit hits, heavy selling pressure, and a downgrade to a Sell rating, reflecting a shift in technical momentum and investor sentiment. Time: 28 minutes ago

item.title: Piccadily Agro Industries Gains 9.66%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Volatility
